{{disambig-more|J.R.R. Tolkien|[[J.R.R. Tolkien (disambiguation)]]}}
'''J.R.R. Tolkien: Origins of Middle-earth''' is a half-hour documentary, directed by [[Michael Pellerin]]. It was included on ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Special Extended DVD Edition#The Appendices: Part Three: The Journey Continues (disc 3)|The Journey Continues]]'', the third disc of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|the extended edition of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'']].
